subtitle: Hello everyone, welcome back to the channel, Astral Doorway, I'm going to share with you
a very simple and unique method for Astral projection i would say less like a method
but more like a practice it's very powerful not just for astral projection but
for focus, meditation, expanding your awareness of life and it can very much help with noticing other
psychic phenomena too i don't think you'll find this method anywhere, forgive me if it is taught
somewhere there's probably similarities with other teachings but regardless this is something not
very stressed in most Astral projection resources so let's get into it, a quick shoutout to Sydney,
Kyle and Luke who have joined the Astral Doorway Discord group through Patreon; we're really
gathering a lovely group of people now and the discussions, advice and resources and experiences
members are sharing on there are really just great to see and if you'd like to join too and
share your wisdom, your experiences, get insights on them, you are very much welcome; just see the
Patreon link below ~ now understand that what I'm going to teach here is extremely simple but it is
perhaps a very difficult thing for most people, not because people are incapable of doing this
but because our life situations make it difficult therefore this very particular method would be
best practiced when you have at least a few days where you have some total freedom like you're on
holiday and you're going to treat these few days to living essentially like a monk in a monastery
this method relies on your continued concentration and willpower, it is not like other methods where
you just focus on a step-by-step thing during your stages of sleep this is much simpler but much more
strenuous this method involves all day practice that means focusing on one thing for 24 hours
now you could definitely see this as a much more advanced method than most but don't let that
demotivate you anyone can do this if you have the deep spiritual aspiration devotion and willpower
to do this you can do it this practice is essentially the main practice i've relied on for
astral projection experiences and when i'm aligned with the practice that i'm going to tell you now i
naturally get many experiences spontaneously when i live like how i'm going to describe it's very
hard to put this practice into words so please be patient listen to the entire episode if you are
really interested and contemplate what i'm saying i know this will be a longer episode because
i'm going to get a lot of questions about what it actually means to practice this and be present and
how it leads to astral projection experiences i'm going to get a lot of questions so i need to cover
as much basis as i can in this talk here there are many methods out there many techniques but there
will always be people who seem to have no success and having a lot of mental distress because
they can't seem to have an experience and so i'm sharing this practice because i think by
practicing it you will understand a lot about the fundamental basics of living a spiritual life
through spiritual practice a lot can be learned by doing this practice you will enhance your life
tenfold in many areas in many dimensions of your life if you do this with strength
successfully this practice is very simple practically it teaches many things in particular
how to be present and what being present really means and how it really feels every individual is
going to get completely different results because all of our states or molds of consciousness
are different we're all different souls right but regardless this is powerful and effective
spiritually no matter what the results it can make a deep impact on your life depending on how you
do it i can't tell you how to do it exactly that's up to you and your own sense of life
so just listen use your intuition and see how you can incorporate what i'm saying into your life if
you decide to practice this so since this is such a simple technique i want to explain it in a way
where you're not going to underestimate the power of it - if i say it in one sentence very simply
many people will say that sounds stupid, mainly because they don't know, or they don't understand
how to do it, how it feels or how effective and impactful this can be on one's consciousness
now with that said i will just say the method simply here it is ~ live every moment of your life
as if you are already astral projecting, don't judge what i just said let's understand this
act as if you are already having an out of body experience ~ okay look, we spend too much
time looking seeking thinking dreaming for an experience that feels completely out of our touch
do you understand the significance of that about being in a compulsive state of looking and never
finding, this method i'm teaching here is about being in a state of 'I have found', not 'I am seeking'...
this compulsive state of looking for something makes you stop noticing what is here and now right
in front of you - do you understand that? you need to learn how to notice what is right in front of you
both in the physical and also in the astral and instead of utilizing your senses by
seeking something out of your own imagination or whatever you end up deafening your senses you end
up ignoring them in hopes that your senses will touch the non-physical this is a complete mistake
our senses our physical senses of sight sound touch smell are gateways into sensing beyond the
physical if you do not know how to consciously use your physical senses during the day when you are
awake how can you expect to use your non-physical senses during the night when you are asleep? as
above so below. this is about being in the present moment. being conscious from moment to moment while
you are awake so that you can also be conscious from moment to moment while you are asleep too. use
your intuition here. this is a completely logical thing to do and practice, now of course i'm going
to keep elaborating on how to practice this so bear with me ~ this practice can be done during
the mundaneness of everyday life when you go to work, speak to your boss, talk to your friends, do
your chores, but more advanced practitioners can probably do this however i am recommending that
sometime in the near future you plan on doing this with some allocated days in your life where you
can practice this at home at your own leisure and preferably alone with no usual routine, you
don't have any commitments during those few days okay the more alone you can be the better as well
instead of being pulled into other people's dreams and unconscious conversations, i'm not saying those
are bad i'm saying that allocating these days to your life is important, not to just be a social
creature all the time - time alone doing these sort of things is crucial for your own humanity, so i
am recommending that you do this because through practicing this intensely you will understand at
a deeper level the true mechanics of how effective this is you know people try all sorts of methods
when they're half tired just ate a big meal or perhaps they're drunk i don't know what you do
regardless they are trying half-heartedly going to work tired sick of this and that and thus
they deem the method as ineffective when really the real issue was that you were not able to give
yourself fully to it that's all that's all that happens when you fail at a particular method so
this is a method i'm teaching but it's also a method to understand how to utilize methods
more effectively so if you commit yourself to this all-day practice with this high you know
this very high bar this high level of practice for a few days you will understand and feel how
it is impacting your life in a profound way you'll notice how much more energy you have more mental
clarity how your intuition is working better you will feel more healthy you will also understand
the power of devotion ~ devotion is a dimension of intelligence which most people do not understand
how to use everyone uses their intellect they are clever they can retain information great who
cares this is an overrated dimension of the human being what is underrated and what is not taught
or valued in schools or society is devotion devotion does not mean you go to a church or a
temple and pray to this or that god, no, devotion means learning how to give yourself fully to a
particular thing and through that act you manifest what you had sought after for so long, understand
this distinction between intellect and devotion; intellect is full of doubts and skepticisms and
confusions, devotion is full of faith and certainty and self-confidence; it is a strength a force
that even your intellect cannot bend devotion is unbending you will go to that direction and you
will succeed because your frame of mind is attuned to success attuned to successful devotion okay so
you become a devotee, an aspirant of consciousness, you open yourself up to be a channel through which
higher intelligence can ground itself, this is not a time for thinking and being
dumb and educated and confused this is a time for greater awareness of your present physical life
it is a time to swim above the surface of your shallow intellect and get out of it to actually
see where you are internally and externally so to be clear the practice goes like this: you set
the days in which you will devote yourself to the practice of being present of your physical senses
24/7 unwavering without interruption okay, the day beforehand getting character okay, this is not
about being pretentious or being fake this isn't for anyone else is it, this is for you and you can
get into character for this prepare yourself like a monk prepare your mind and body in a way where
you will have the energy, the focus, the discipline for this and so the next day beforehand you tell
yourself what you're going to do you're going to feel the expectation, the anticipation and see
in your mind's eye what you're going to do these next few days you will focus on being present
nothing else what does that mean? that means about what i spoke earlier about the five
senses it means you are going to fully devote yourself to actually consciously noticing these
senses throughout your entire day, actually see where you are colours, shapes, objects hear all the
sounds around you feel what things feel like and what else are you going to be conscious of ~ you're
going to also be conscious of how you feel inside not labeling your emotions not thinking about
them but just feeling the atmosphere of yourself how it feels to be you notice thoughts, feelings
senses and do you think that you can only focus on one of these things at a time? do you think that
the greatest intelligence of the human being was only limited to be aware of all of these senses
one at a time? no, it's only because we've been taught in society to only use the intellect but
you do not use the intellect to use your senses that's ridiculous - you use awareness you will find
when you are more relaxed free from worries, stress overthinking, concerned about the past and future
that you can be aware of all of these things all of these senses at the same time it is
the perception of the experience of being you the movie of your life audio, visual, touch, smell, taste
they're not separate they're only separate because our intellect makes them so so contemplate how
significant it is to do this because let me tell you when you have an astral projection experience
many often say it feels more real than physical life because it is experienced
as a full-blown six-sense movie - i say six senses because you have the five physical senses plus the
sense of your own inner emotions and thoughts the sense of your own atmosphere let's call it
so do you see how you have to learn how to experience life like this? if you cannot experience
life like that if you do not know how to press the record button on your daily
experience on all of the six senses then how do you expect to do it with your astral body
how in the world do you expect to even remember your experiences if you are not being aware
of your physical experiences here and now ~ now don't be kicking yourself saying i can't do this
i'm not strong enough my life is too difficult blah blah blah right rome wasn't built in a day
relax this is nothing to be intimidated by, at least you can know the practice now and
one day we'll perhaps give it a go do you think anyone can initially do this with ease?
no, not even i can do that of course not this is why there is practice we have ego, we have
darkness; like i said before we are dumb right? we need practice we have this deluded intellect this
great veil of illusion that is so difficult to look past so you just do it you're not going to do
it perfectly but you sure are going to make much more progress than if you don't do it i remember a
talk by a monk who said that uh you know at first he was concerned that he kept "falling" right? not
physically falling but falling in consciousness he kept you know losing his attention he kept maybe
getting angry and a teacher told him well that's good the practice is falling and getting back up
again it's all about how fast and how strongly uh you can get up again right not falling and staying
on the ground but simply getting back that is the essence of practice now i don't want to scare you
off even more but let me put into perspective the scale of challenge here; most people cannot even
concentrate on a single thing on a single object for 60 seconds maybe even for 30 seconds, people
cannot focus on the breath or a candle flame for 30 seconds without their attention wavering and
so give them this practice where the ultimate goal is to concentrate all day they'll go crazy right
it's difficult but it's powerful if you've read my book i gave an account near the beginning about a
sudden spiritual awakening that i had in physical life, this experience, near the start of my own path
left me in tears, awe, many sublime realizations ~ just pure beauty there was no separation from myself
and the world and i was sitting on a park bench unintentionally for many hours i only realized
i was there for so long when i noticed the sky was becoming dark, and i was just there in pure awe
without thought, but pure consciousness, as if i had taken a drug like DMT or something --
I was practicing this practice for many days intensely before that spiritual awakening
and so you see if you are consistent with this practice if you maintain your focus on being
grounded in the physical and you don't let your old habits and egoic ordinary thoughts to come in
there is a certain threshold where your ego says "okay this is clearly not working
i can't possess the mind the thoughts of this person anymore i'm just going to leave"... in other
words the veil of illusion collapses suddenly between this world and the spiritual world and
if you're in a high state of consciousness you will essentially experience what is called heaven
on earth i know i'm talking vaguely but i trust that many of you understand what i'm saying here...
so to get back to describing this method you could call this method the presence method about
not looking for a future experience but being here and now deeply grounded it is about raising your
level of being it's about being better right? in a sense it's about being perfect you may have
seen diagrams like this before now you don't expand beyond the physical to get to the astral
by thinking of the physical in a negative way you do it by embracing this physical life i see a lot
of people in astral projection community saying things all the time like "i'm sick of this earth
i just want to leave it i'm sick of this life this 3d existence and i want to go to other worlds"...
well sorry it doesn't work like that you first have to come to peace with earth first
you have to come to peace with your own life first and then you will be allowed to go beyond it
and to make all of this easier and simpler for you, to be aware of all your senses at the same
time and to be deeply present of you know the deeper intelligences within yourself and
outer life, this can be all synthesized into one very simple thought which you can hold with you
throughout the day and you may also say it to yourself like a mantra you can say "I am in the
Astral plane" or "I am Astral projecting"... now of course this isn't a lie you're not delusional
right? you know subconsciously that you're in the physical but you're going to tell yourself
and act as if you're already astral projecting, that's it, simple, through this thought acting as
if you are in the astral already you should gain a sense of wonder about where you are it will
train you to pay attention to the possibility of anything happening at any moment just like
how anything can happen in astral projection experiences this will make you aware and alert
sending the cognitive functions of your brain and consciousness into overdrive, so we're not trying
to be delusional with this or convince ourselves that we're actually in the astral in many ways yes
you are encompassing an astral body on top of your physical body but the point here is to be present
and you can be present of certain astral energies and forces in the physical too okay so as above
so below be present while you are awake and you will be present while you sleep ~ now activities
you should do during the day avoid tv and social media these are just mindless things for your
brain to sleep on we don't want sleepiness, we don't want unconsciousness, we want to be awake
alive in the moment in the sacredness, in the divinity of life of existence, we don't want to
be brain dead right you can if it helps you watch a few spiritual videos to help you be more mindful
and present but this sitting and laying around being a potato should be very much limited instead
do activities that are holistic, healthy, active or creative, you can do some exercise nothing
where you exert yourself like a sweaty gorilla or something, do something relaxed peaceful going on a
long conscious walk would be ideal be conscious of every step you take, and all the sensations around
you let your mind come to a natural inner silence by paying attention to the world around you
you can even practice this if you are doing chores around your house okay do something present
conscious be aware of how you're moving your body when's the last time you consciously moved your
hand? your arms? being fully conscious of it of the sensations of who is moving your body right
you can also do some light reading meditation do some conscious cooking taking your time
consciously eat, don't eat too much or you might get too lethargic, take a long bath
activities that engage your senses in a healthy way and get you out of the mundane
brainwaves of being a cerebral intellectual mammal... also be conscious of your breathing throughout the
entire day tensions in the body everything it is your experience of life right is it not? live
intensely as if it was your last day of your life live as if when you go to sleep you are
going to die there is no tomorrow nothing else matters except the appreciation of this day
and this moment of life go out to a park, appreciate the sun on your skin, the beauty of
birds flying around you when practiced correctly when immersed fully when surrendered totally
to this practice this can lead to a spiritual awakening and physical life and you won't care
for having astral projection experiences anymore because you will become totally here and now in
the present moment as if every moment was your last and is it a difficult state to maintain? no,
this is your natural state this is your home it is only our intellect that makes it difficult, our ego
our internal reasoning and chatter -- this is the state that you want for astral projection to occur
naturally and spontaneously this is the opposite state of the vicious ego of desire of the restless
child within us that wants candies from the shop window and cries when it can't get any of it
right? this is how many of us think when it comes to psychic phenomena and astral projection
experiences; we keep crying at the fact that we can't experience it but that crying is what is
stopping us and so with every moment as your last living presently when you go to sleep there will
be nothing for your consciousness to work through you will be at total peace with yourself and thus
there will be no need for unconscious dreaming and the window for out-of-body experiences will
be much more in your grasp when you go to sleep try to keep the flame of awareness stay lit
naturally it will fade here and there as you fall into your own unconscious but wake up multiple
times in the middle of your sleep wake up at least once to become present again for a few minutes and
then go back to sleep think of this as having a fireplace in the inner house of your body the fire
is your awareness that you've been attending to that awareness that stays present and keeps you
grounded in physical reality and by getting up in the middle of the night you just tend to that
fire you stay alert present and aware you let any unconscious thought or internal chatter come to a
natural silence if you do this multiple times in the night you can do it every two hours into your
sleep in fact i basically guarantee you will have at the very least some very vivid and significant
dreams and remember i'm recommending this sort of homemade spiritual retreat boot camp to be
at least a few days for you to practice and so there would be no reason to not be able to wake up
multiple times in your sleep if you are tired the next day you can simply take a midday nap
that is another wonderful opportunity for you to possibly have an out of body experience
and when you do go to sleep you can absolutely use whatever actual projection method you feel you
want to you don't need to plan or think about it you'll find after spending your entire day in this
way being present not thinking that your mind will work a lot more efficiently when you do choose to
use it you'll be able to be much more intuitively connected to what you should do in those moments
whether you sense that you should just sleep and you feel that you will have an experience
naturally or whether you feel you should do a certain exercise like the astral projection
mantra that i taught in the video that's on the screen now i also recommend that you listen to
the episode i made called 'The Principle of Conserving Energy' i'll link it down in the
description below i will also once again recommend an audio book for being present which is 'The Power
of Now by Eckhart Tolle' if you have read this book before and didn't think much of it and
especially if you just read it fast without any real reading right without any real contemplation
i urge you to read it again slowly and really pay attention without thinking and recognize
the truth that said that it will help a lot for this practice if you've already read that
book i know many of you have then look for eckhart tolle's other work he has many videos he has other
books that are more tailored for being practical about this such as 'Practicing the Power of Now'
that's a different book and also 'A New Earth' ~ so be here now all day with the intention of utilizing
this presence for astral travel at night live; as if you are already astral projecting as if you
are already an astral projector bring wonder and amazement back into your physical waking life i
want to state again a very clear universal law one cannot enter the fifth dimension of consciousness
,the astral plane, if you do not enjoy this dimension the third dimension you have to
enjoy this one embrace it bring ore and magic and love back into it then the other world will open
up for you in reality in this sick society that we live in this type of practice should be prescribed
to everyone at minimum once a year to be able to devote yourself to be freed from the shackles and
chains of everyday life and soar your consciousness into the horizons beyond this physical dimension
to go beyond the five senses this is a beautiful and transcendental and powerful and healing
practice which can bring many moments of that which is called in Zen Buddhism as 'Satori';
spontaneous moments of spiritual realization... okay so three days, present, totally, devoted, aware, alert
of the dimension that you encompass from moment to moment ~ what you are aware of what you accept you
go beyond ~ really this practice requires an entire book to totally understand but i trust that those
who have the ears to hear will understand what i'm saying with that said any questions as usual feel
free to ask i'm going to end this episode with a very relevant quote that relates to the attitude
or spirit of this practice, it is once again from the native American shaman Don Juan Matus
i'm going to paraphrase it a bit so it's more understandable for a wider audience... "a spiritual
aspirant in other words a spiritual warrior never feels attacked to be attacked implies that one has
personal possessions or identifications that could be stolen or offended a warrior has nothing
in the world except his impeccability and impeccability cannot be threatened
impeccability means his or her devotion to their spiritual practice in a battle for one's progress
a warrior should use every means available we must live our lives impeccably for no other reason than
to be impeccable impeccability is usually defined as being perfect or having no flaws incapable of
doing wrong while this is partially correct about being perfect in the warrior sense
impeccability is to save or conserve energy impeccability is nothing else but the proper use
of energy impeccability has no inkling of morality when we have saved energy that makes us impeccable
to understand this we have to practice and save enough energy ourselves by stopping our internal
dialogue our inner chatter it's common for a sort of pessimism to take over a warrior at a certain
point on his path a sense of defeat or perhaps more accurately a sense of unworthiness comes upon
them a warrior's resolution to live impeccably in spite of everything does not ensure success
the warrior enters into a state of unsurpassed humility and humbleness
when the true poverty of our human resources becomes undeniable the warrior has no choice but
to step down and lower his head it is monstrous to think that the world is understandable
or that we ourselves are understandable what we are perceiving is an enigma a mystery that
one can only accept in humbleness and or the two sides of human being consciousness and ego
are totally separate and it takes great discipline and determination to break that seal and go from
one side to the other from this world to others we have been put together by forces incomprehensible
to our reason our intellect the only thing we do not have is time every minute might be our last
therefore it is to be lived with the spirit god or consciousness i'm going to disclose to you
a warriors secret perhaps you could call it a warrior's predilection most people think it's a
lonely path the life of a warrior cannot possibly be cold and lonely and without feelings because it
is based on their affection their devotion their dedication to their beloved and who you ask is
their beloved i will show you now a warrior's love is the world physical earth the third dimension
they embrace this enormous earth the earth knows that they love it and it bestows on them its care
that's why their life is filled to the brim and their state wherever they'll be will be
plentiful they roam on the paths of their love and wherever they are they are complete
this is the predilection of a warrior this earth this world for a warrior there can be no greater
love only if one loves this earth with unbending passion then one can release one's sadness
a warrior is always joyful because their love is unalterable and their beloved
the earth embraces them and bestows upon them inconceivable gifts such as
astral projection"... some paraphrasing there but as you can see it is the native American
attitude of treating your own physical universe with love, care and attention and what you put
out you will get back... so I hope you enjoyed this be sure to be subscribed for more videos
this is Gene Hart and I will see you on the next episode which is about
why you should be mindful when sharing certain Astral projection experiences... see you next time!
